channel.title: What's the best AP pack to buy for future bass and melodic type music?
channel.description: I have like 10 dollars so don't say buy all of them, I want 2 packs but can't decide which ones to buy... I'm going for an Illenium or Flume vibe with my tracks so what packs would work best with that in mind?

item.title: What's the best AP pack to buy for future bass and melodic type music?
item.dc:creator: FortyMiles
item.description:
7 Skies selections and sound of Vibrant

item.title: What's the best AP pack to buy for future bass and melodic type music?
item.dc:creator: viiitality
item.description:
for future bass, the 7 Skies and Vivrant packs are best because of the Silk, Stress and Hour combo (aka the go-to future bass combo of dreams)

for melodic music, I think it’s based off opinion. i think that RAC and Vivrant is best for melodic stuff like that, but ^shrug^

Read full topic
